title: Moviews
description: A full-stack web app that allows the users to login, read reviews, and filter out spoilers via a spoiler toggle feature, as well as write reviews for other users to see.
tools: Node, Express, Passport, Sequelize, Handlebars, and Bootstrap.

title: It's All in the Mind
description: A memory game built around characters from the Parappa the Rapper series of rhythm video games.

title: Gem Collector
description: A game using Steven Universe characters and random number generators.

title: GifTastic
description: A tool to dynamically pull and display gid image files from Giphy.

title: Dinosaur Deep Cuts
description: A simple hangman game for complex dinosaur species.
